Params: {2: '-AI-', 3: 'Virtual combat has ended. Result calculations complete. Low enemy elimination rate... Mission failed.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Recommended Stategy: Lotus has sustained heavy injuries. Use her to lure in enemies and destroy them with an area attack.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Why? This is the only option for maximizing efficiency to yield the most optimal results.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I should remind you, this is the final stage of the battle. Upon completion, the virtual team will disappear and nothing will remain.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Perhaps, you should listen to the recommended strategy, but I won't stand in your way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After all... our goal is to push the system to its limits. Use whichever strategy you deem the best.', 4: '1'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Only the final elite enemy remains. Our team has suffered no casualties, but combat power has been depleted. Command system paralyzed and unable to give orders.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Do you wish to proceed according to the original strategic recommendation?'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: "Blast's attack has destroyed the enemy's foothold, causing the enemy to lose balance."}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Bastion has pinned down the elite enemy. Bastion has offset the close-ranged attacks with his shield. However, his shield is nearing its breaking point.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: "Veritas' arrows have pinned the elite enemy to the ground, allowing Bastion to withdraw."}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'The elite enemy has been vanquished. Combat complete. Casualties... zero.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What can I say, you really are something. The data we collected exceeded our expectations. This stage of testing is complete.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The test data from this test will be cleared and I will adjust the system accordingly. Come back again next week. Have a good one.', 4: '1'}
